tags.name: movable-element
tags.description: The **`movable-element`** element allows you to move an element within the DOM.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: **Required**. The **`ID`** of the target element without the **`#`**.

attributes.name: media
attributes.description: **Optional**. Media query for applying the movable element. Default is **`(max-width: 768px)`**.

attributes.name: manual
attributes.description: **Optional**. If the **`manual`** attribute is present, the element will not move automatically.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: **Optional**. The position of the element relative to the target element. Accepts **integer** values or **`start`**, **`end`**, **`before`**, **`after`**, **`replace`**, and **`swap`**. Default is **`end`**.

values.name: start
values.description: The element will be the **first child** of the target element.

values.name: end
values.description: The element will be the **last child** of the target element.

values.name: before
values.description: The element will be placed **before** the target element.

values.name: after
values.description: The element will be placed **after** the target element.

values.name: replace
values.description: The element will **replace** the target element.

values.name: swap
values.description: The element will **swap** places with the target element.
